aiPredictions.title: Steel Casket Demand Spike
aiPredictions.description: Based on trending data, Steel Casket sales are predicted to increase by 15% next month.

aiPredictions.title: Eco-Friendly Growth

aiPredictions.title: Copper Casket Restocking

aiPredictions.title: Premium Package Upsell Opportunity
aiPredictions.description: 40% of Essential Package customers inquire about upgrades. Implementing targeted upselling could increase conversion.

aiPredictions.title: December Holiday Season Surge
aiPredictions.description: Historical patterns show 15% increase in December. Prepare for end-of-year planning spike.

aiPredictions.title: Traditional Package Popularity
aiPredictions.description: Traditional Service Package continues to be #1 seller. Maintain strong inventory and service capacity.
